answers.answer: You tasted your urine? Ugh. Sweet smelling urine is a warning sign something bad is occurring in your body. Ignoring it is not the answer. Go see a doctor ASAP. Some causes for sweet urine:diabetes mellitustoo much sugar in your dietthyroid diseaseliver disease

question: My urine tastes sweet, and now I am scared **** less. Is this an indication of diabetes or prediabetes? Please answer,  what do I do now.
title: Sweet Urine
